scripts.serve: cd backend; dev_appserver.py --skip_sdk_update_check yes -A ${GOOGLE_CLOUD_PROJECT:=k2lab-firauth} --appidentity_email_address dev-app@${GOOGLE_CLOUD_PROJECT:=k2lab-firauth}.iam.gserviceaccount.com --appidentity_private_key_path service_account.pem app.yaml
scripts.deploy:appengine: cd backend; appcfg.py -v update --oauth2_access_token $(gcloud auth print-access-token 2> /dev/null) -A ${GOOGLE_CLOUD_PROJECT:=k2lab-firauth} -E SLACK_CLIENT_ID:${SLACK_CLIENT_ID} -E SLACK_CLIENT_SECRET:${SLACK_CLIENT_SECRET} -E SESSION_SECRET:$(base64 /dev/random| head -c 32) --version 1 app.yaml
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:firebase && npm run deploy:appengine
